about_the_game:
Tropical Hearts is a turn-based RPG about five close-knit friends eager to go on a well deserved vacation. When they're offered a luxurious stay at Paradise Island, they’ve no idea what’s awaiting them! Involved in a battle against mysterious, otherworldly creatures, our heroes unlock their magical potential - and the road to each other's hearts!

Play as Alex Alvarez, an adventurous and fun-loving maned wolf with mild authority issues. Alex' gender is up to you! There's plenty of fun, spicy dates to go on throughout the game - there will be 66 full Dates and 30 Story Events! Relax at the beach, chill out in Town and shake that sweet bum to the latest dance floor hits!



You’re accompanied by your quartet of best friends - all of whom are notably single and ready to mingle. Get to know them even better as you relax on the beach, hike through the local wilderness or discover what Paradise Town has to offer. Even if you don’t want to get romantically involved with a character, you can always complete their Story Route as friends.
And to add some mystery to the mix, there’s several sexy strangers waiting for you across Paradise Island, each with their own story to tell.



Defend your tropical paradise side by side with your friends! Choose from a vast array of Skills to target your enemy's weaknesses and get your powers boosted by your friends. The stronger your mutual bond, the more havoc you'll wreak in battle!



As you explore the mysterious isles surrounding Paradise Island, you’ll learn more about the strange history of this place. Collect precious materials to upgrade your weapons, craft new items to aid you in your quest, and try out various experimental cocktails lovingly prepared by Marc, the veteran bartender at the Hotel Bar!
A strangely familiar voice calls to you in your dreams as you delve deeper and deeper into the mystery behind the otherworldly attackers. Why are these creatures here, and what do they want? It's up to you to find out!
